sourcesContent:
import React, { Component, Fragment, useState } from "react";

import {
  Button,
  Card,
  CardHeader,
  CardBody,
  FormGroup,
  Form,
  Input,
  Row,
  Col
} from "reactstrap";
import {graphql} from 'react-apollo';


// import gql from "graphql-tag";
import { Mutation } from "react-apollo";
import { Link } from 'react-router-dom';
import queries from 'queries/Empresas.jsx';
import { ToastProvider, useToasts } from 'react-toast-notifications'




 toastform=(props)=>{
    
    const state=props.variables;
    const { addToast } = useToasts();
    addToast('Saved Successfully', { appearance: 'success' })
    const showMessage= () => addToast('Saved Successfully', { appearance: 'success' })


  handleChange=e=>{

    this.setState({
             ... this.state.form,
            [e.target.name]:e.target.value,
    });
};

    const {nombre,usuario,correo, provincia, canton, distrito} = this.state

    return (
              <Form>
                <Row>
                  <Col className="px-1" md="3">
                    <FormGroup>
                      <label>Nombre</label>
                      <Input
                        placeholder="nombre"
                        type="text"
                        name="nombre"
                        onChange={this.handleChange}
                      />
                    </FormGroup>
                  </Col>
                  <Col className="pl-1" md="4">
                    <FormGroup>
                      <label htmlFor="exampleInputEmail1">
                        Correo
                          </label>
                      <Input placeholder="Email" type="email" name="correo" onChange={this.handleChange}
                       />
                    </FormGroup>
                  </Col>
                  <Col className="pr-1" md="4">
                    <FormGroup>
                      <label>Usuario</label>
                      <Input
                        defaultValue="Mike"
                        placeholder="Company"
                        type="text"
                        name="usuario"
                        onChange={this.handleChange}
                      />
                    </FormGroup>
                  </Col>
                </Row>
                <Row>
                  <Col className="pl-1" md="4">
                    <FormGroup>
                      <label>Provincia</label>
                      <Input
                        defaultValue="Andrew"
                        placeholder="Last Name"
                        type="text"
                        name="provincia"
                        onChange={this.handleChange}
                      />
                    </FormGroup>
                  </Col>
                  <Col className="px-1" md="4">
                    <FormGroup>
                      <label>Cantón</label>
                      <Input
                        defaultValue="Andrew"
                        placeholder="Country"
                        type="text"
                        name="canton"
                        onChange={this.handleChange}
                      />
                    </FormGroup>
                  </Col>
                  <Col className="px-1" md="4">
                    <FormGroup>
                      <label>Distrito</label>
                      <Input
                        placeholder="Country"
                        type="text"
                        name="distrito"
                        onChange={this.handleChange}
                      />
                    </FormGroup>
                  </Col>
                </Row>
                <Row>
                  <Col md="12">
                    <FormGroup>
                      <label>Dirección</label>
                      <Input
                        placeholder="Home Address"
                        type="text"
                        name="direccion"
                      />
                    </FormGroup>
                  </Col>
                </Row>
                <Row>
                  <Col className="pr-1" md="4">
                    <FormGroup>
                      <label>Distrito</label>
                      <Input
                        placeholder="City"
                        type="text"
                        name="no"
                      />
                    </FormGroup>
                  </Col>

                  <Col className="pl-1" md="4">
                    <FormGroup>
                      <label>N.Cuenta</label>
                      <Input placeholder="x-xxxxxxx-xxx-x" type="text" name="cuenta" />
                    </FormGroup>
                  </Col>
                </Row>
                <Mutation mutation={queries.addEmpresas}  variables={{nombre, correo, provincia, canton, distrito}}>
                  {postEmpresa=>
                  <Row>
                    <Col md="12">
                      <FormGroup>
                        <Button color="primary" onClick={postEmpresa}>Guardar</Button>
                      </FormGroup>
                    </Col>
                  </Row>
                  }
                </Mutation>
              </Form>
     
    );
  
}

export default graphql(queries.addEmpresas)(toastform);
// export default Formuser;

// mutation onCompleted={() => this.props.history.push('/')}
